titles.title: Stand Up, and Bless the Lord

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Stand up, and bless the Lord, ye people of His choice; stand up, and bless the Lord your God with heart, and soul, and voice.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho' high above all praise, above all blessing high, who would not fear His holy Name, and laud and magnify?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O for the living flame, from His own altar brought, to touch our lips, our mind inspire, and wing to heav'n our thought!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There, with benign regard, our hymns He deigns to hear; though unrevealed to mortal sense, the spirit feels Him near.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: God is our strength and song, and His salvation ours; then be His love in Christ proclaimed with all our ransomed pow'rs.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Stand up and bless the Lord, the Lord your God adore; stand up, and bless His glorious Name henceforth for evermore.
